Room.Name: East Ulandia
Room.ShortDescription: You are on East Ulandia, just east of the Baldywyne River, near a small cave.
Room.LongDescription: The cave is on a vacant lot to the east, and seems to be a tunnel that heads in the direction of the Brownhaven Garbage Pits. There's a rotten smell coming the entrance to the cave. A little to north of the cave entrance there is an old wooden shack. Someone appears to be living there as smoke issues from a slender smoke stack. Even the smoke stinks.
